p.a: Osage County Health Department Offering COVID-19 Testing by Appointment

a.aria-label: Read more about Curbside COVID-19 Testing

div.p: On Tuesday, April 7, 2020, Hominy Public Schools will begin our distance learning program that has become necessary during the COVID-19 crisis. Our distance learning program will begin with packets for students that will be picked up or distributed weekly. Packets can be picked up at your Child's school site from 7:30 a.m. - 12:00 p.m. on each Tuesday through May 11, 2020. Packets will be delivered to students who normally ride a bus in the morning. Buses will run at the usual time Tuesday morning. Students will need to be ready at their stops when teh bus normally arrives. You may visit your child's school Facebook site or the school website for more information about the distance learning program and how the closure will affect other school activities.

I also want to take time to thank all of our staff at Hominy Public Schools. The Principals, Teachers and Support Staff have all jumped in to take on this challenge head on. I hope everyone knows how much our staff cares about the feeding, education and well-being of your children. Below, please find distance learning information for each school site.

a.aria-label: Read more about Student Packets for Distance Learning

div.p: Hominy Public School will be providing their students with free meals beginning Tuesday, March 24, 2020. If you would like to sign your child(ren) up to receive meals, simply click on the link below. Further dates will be added in the coming days.

a.aria-label: Read more about Free Meals for Students

p.span: A big thank you to all of you in the community who voted YES on the new school bond project. We are excited about the future of our school.
Please see the following short video which explains what the project will accomplish.

a.aria-label: Read more about School Bond Project Passes

td.span: Patchy fog after 1am. Otherwise, partly cloudy, with a low around 45. East wind around 5 mph becoming calm.
Patchy fog before 10am. Otherwise, mostly sunny, with a high near 75. Light and variable wind becoming southwest 5 to 10 mph in the afternoon.
Partly cloudy, with a low around 49. West wind around 5 mph becoming east after midnight.
